languages.text:
Requires {g|Encyclopedia:SoulMarkFaith}Dogmatic{/g} — Follower
This helmet grants its wearer immunity to enemy critical {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hits{/g} for the first 3 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}rounds{/g} of combat.
languages.original_text:
Требуется: {g|Encyclopedia:SoulMarkFaith}Догматик{/g} — последователь
Этот шлем дает владельцу иммунитет к вражеским критическим {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}попаданиям{/g} в течение первых 3 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}раундов{/g} боя.

需要信念：{g|Encyclopedia:SoulMarkFaith}教条主义{/g}——追随者
装备者在战斗的前三{g|Encyclopedia:Round}轮{/g}中免疫敌方所有暴击。{g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}{/g}

languages.text:
{g|Encyclopedia:SoulMarkFaith}教条主義{/g} ― 信者が必要
このヘルメットは戦闘の最初の3{g|Encyclopedia:Round}ラウンド{/g}の間、使用者への敵のクリティカル{g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}ヒット{/g}が無効になる。
languages.original_text:
Requires {g|Encyclopedia:SoulMarkFaith}Dogmatic{/g} — Follower
This helmet grants its wearer immunity to enemy critical {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hits{/g} for the first 3 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}rounds{/g} of combat.

traits.locale_text:
帝国 ― 信者が必要
戦闘開始後3{g|Encyclopedia:Round}ラウンド{/g}の間、自身への敵のクリティカル{g|Encyclopedia:Hit}ヒット{/g}が無効になる。

languages.text:
Requiere {g|Encyclopedia:SoulMarkFaith}Dogmático{/g}: Seguidor
Este casco proporciona a su portador inmunidad a los {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}impactos{/g} críticos del enemigo durante los 3 primeros {g|Encyclopedia:Round}asaltos{/g} del combate.

traits.locale_text:
Requiere Imperialis: Seguidor
Este casco proporciona a su portador inmunidad a los {g|Encyclopedia:Hit}impactos{/g} críticos del enemigo durante los 3 primeros {g|Encyclopedia:Round}asaltos{/g} del combate.

languages.text:
Erfordert {g|Encyclopedia:SoulMarkFaith}Dogmatiker{/g} — Jünger
Dieser Helm gewährt seinem Träger die ersten 3 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}Runden{/g} im Kampf Immunität gegen feindliche kritische {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}Treffer{/g}.
languages.original_text:

traits.locale_text:
Erfordert Imperialis – Jünger
Dieser Helm gewährt seinem Träger Immunität gegen feindliche kritische {g|Encyclopedia:Hit}Treffer{/g} für die ersten 3 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}Runden{/g} im Kampf.

languages.text:
Requiert {g|Encyclopedia:SoulMarkFaith}Dogmatique{/g} — Serviteur.
Ce casque rend son utilisateur invulnérable aux {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}coups{/g} critiques des ennemis pendant les 3 premiers {g|Encyclopedia:Round}rounds{/g} du combat.

traits.locale_text:

languages.text:
{g|Encyclopedia:SoulMarkFaith}Dogmatik{/g} — Takipçi kanaati gerektirir
Bu miğfer, takan kişiye çatışmanın ilk 3 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}raundunda{/g} yapılacak düşman kritik {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}vuruşlarına{/g} karşı bağışıklık kazandırır.
